resources.string: This permission will enable the app to take photos and record videos
This permission will enable the app to pick up sound when recording videos
This permission will enable the app to pick up sounds
This app will be able to write, download, save, read, modify, and delete pictures, videos, files and other information
Denying microphone permission access\nmay lead to the inability to record sound in videos
Denying camera permission access\nmay result in the inability to use camera functions
